meta.content: Gore Public Schools - Updated School Closure 3/25/2020

Today the Oklahoma State Board of Education cancelled all public schools' on campus activities. This is for the remainder of the school year ending for all schools May 8 thru May 15. All schools are mandated to move to "distant learning" for all students. GPS will continue to provide meals to students during this time. We will transition to a distance learning platform to complete our school...

meta.title: Gore Public Schools - Updated School Closure 3/25/2020

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 09:53 am CDT

div.div: Showers and possibly a thunderstorm before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Some of the storms could produce heavy rainfall. High near 71. Southeast wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

Showers and thunderstorms likely, mainly before 1am. Cloudy, with a low around 56. South wind 10 to 15 mph becoming northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
Cloudy through mid morning, then gradual clearing, with a high near 76. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph.

div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

div.p: Today the Oklahoma State Board of Education cancelled all public schools' on campus activities. This is for the remainder of the school year ending for all schools May 8 thru May 15. All schools are mandated to move to "distant learning" for all students. GPS will continue to provide meals to students during this time. We will transition to a distance learning platform to complete our school year ending May 8. Your student's detailed distance learning plan will be available on Monday, April 6. We will notify all students on how to access this plan by April 3rd through FB, school web site and our all call phone-email system.
